SELECT MAX(reality)reality, MAX(plan) plan from
( select (case WHEN DocTagName="MK_JQJ_1.JQL_PV" THEN DocValue END ) as reality, (CASE WHEN DocTagName="MK_JQJ_1.QZJH" THEN DocValue END )as plan
from docdata WHERE (DocTagName="MK_JQJ_1.JQL_PV" or DocTagName="MK_JQJ_1.QZJH") AND TO_DAYS(DataTime) =TO_DAYS(NOW()) ORDER BY DataTime DESC LIMIT 2)a
